body_html:
@yaroslavvb I think, the your latest comment has been written with no development experience/knowledge on Matlab(or you write such a meaningless thing intentionaly). With such a unacceptable approach, decline on TF's performance and quality will continue. This bug is an evidence of such a bad progress; #14107

At least they accepted the problem in the bug, they did not bury their heads in to the sand...
